label: 迦陵頻
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A court-music (gagaku) piece. According to the Amida Sutra, the kalavinka, a human-headed bird with a voice of supernatural beauty, sings of the Buddhist Law in the Pure Land. [雅楽]
